animeTitle: Akuma no Riddle: Shousha wa Dare? Nukiuchi Test
animeDescription: Unaired episode 13 of Akuma no Riddle released with the seventh Blu-ray/DVD volume.The special will be previewed at a screening in Tokyo City on November 22, 2014. The BD/DVD will be released on December 17, 2014.
